import s from './StyleDrink/Drink.module.css' import {NavLink} from "react-router-dom"; import React from "react"; const Drink = (props) => { let BuyItem return (
{props.drink.map(u =>
{u.name}
Від {u.cost} грн
{u.structure}
{ props.buy(props.drink[u.id - 1]) } }> Замовити
< /NavLink>
) }
) } export default Drink;
